Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0124 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
CART Cart - patient travels on cart or gurneyCart - patient travels on cart or gurney
PORT The examining device goes to patient's locationThe examining device goes to patient's location
WALK Patient walks to diagnostic servicePatient walks to diagnostic service
WHLC WheelchairWheelchair

Additional Language Displays

CodeDeutsch (German, de)
CARTPatient wird auf Trage transportiert
PORTUntersuchung am Krankenbett
WALKPatient geht zu Fuß zum Funktionsbereich
WHLCRollstuhl

name: TransportationMode
title: transportationMode
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts which specify how (or whether) to transport a patient, when applicable, for an ordered service.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the OBR segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0124 (Transportation Mode)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.definition: The examining device goes to patient's location

designation.value: Patient geht zu Fuß zum Funktionsbereich
